patthana20.2:1.1: Naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.2:3.1: Naasaṅkhataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saṅkhato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.2:5.1_0: Nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanaṁ
patthana20.2:5.1_1: dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana20.2:5.1_2: sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
patthana20.2:6.1: Nasanidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana20.2:7.1: Nasanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Naanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.2:8.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte
patthana20.2:8.1_1: tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṁ, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye dve, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane
patthana20.2:8.1_2: ekaṁ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke …pe… magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana20.2:9.1_0: Nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasappaṭighaṁ
patthana20.2:9.1_1: dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana20.2:9.1_2: sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:10.1_0: Naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naappaṭighaṁ
patthana20.2:10.1_1: dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana20.2:10.1_2: sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:11.1: Nasappaṭighañca naappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.2:12.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.2:13.1: Narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.2:14.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.2:15.1_0: Nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana20.2:15.1_1: paṭicca lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo
patthana20.2:15.1_2: ca lokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:16.1: Nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:17.1: Nalokiyañca nalokuttarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1.) (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.2:18.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana20.2:19.1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
